description: Increases damage-to-inflict with intelligence based weapons in combat.
Increases damage-to-inflict with offensive magic spells in combat.
Each rank in Intelligence increases spell damage by 5%.
Also, each 6 ranks in Intelligence increases AP by 1.
Increases defenses against enemy offensive magic spells.
Each rank in Willpower increases magic protection by 3.
Increases damage-to-inflict with strength based weapons in combat.
Each rank in Strength increases Damage by 5%.
Also, each 6 ranks in Strength increases AP by 1.
Increases damage-to-inflict with dexterity based weapons in combat.
Each rank in Dexterity increases Damage by 5%.
Also, each 6 ranks in Dexterity increases AP by 1.
Represents the real physical damage your character can take
before dying. Each rank in Constitution increases 1 HP.
Represents energy for magic spells and other special attacks.
Doing such an action decreases your character's Stamina.
Stamina will also decrease when taking damage from attacks.
When Stamina hits 0, your character will experience combat penalties.
Each rank in Stamina increases 1 HP, which is also energy.
Increases combat initiative. More Speed means a faster turn rate.
Also, each 3 ranks in Speed increases AP by 1.
